articles.author: Compiled by Craig Taylor
articles.title: Brevis' heroics not enough as SA U19s crash out of Cricket World Cup
articles.description: Despite a fine innings by Dewald Brevis, South Africa has crashed out of the U19 Cricket World Cup after they were thrashed by England in the quarter-finals.
articles.content:
Despite a fine innings by Dewald Brevis, South Africa has crashed out of the U19 Cricket World Cup after they were thrashed by 6 wickets in a quarter-final clash against England.
Brevis (97) was the… [+1096 chars]

articles.author: PA Staff
articles.title: Kick It Out to venture into more sports after announcing ECB partnership
articles.description: Kick It Out’s new partnership with the England and Wales Cricket Board is set to be the first of more ventures by the organisation into different sports.
articles.content:

articles.title: What we learned from watching the 1992 World Cup final in full again | ESPNcricinfo.com
articles.description: Wides, lbw calls, swing - plenty of things were different in white-ball cricket back then | ESPNcricinfo.com
articles.content: Last week, we at ESPNcricinfo did something we have been thinking of doing for eight years now: pretend-live ball-by-ball commentary for a classic cricket match. We knew the result, yes, but we tried… [+6823 chars]
